Agree. This person might be in danger from themselves due to psychosis/delirium. Call 114, they can send police, ambulance (who can call a doctor if necessary) or if in Copenhagen the Sociolance (social ambulance). 
If this is your concern, I would always recommend calling first then they can take the next steps to help the (possible) patient. 
If they decide the person is not clinically insane, then you can always document disturbances to your landlord afterwards - as it's annoying for you but not a medical emergency issue.
